name: t01_show_int
src:
x: Int = 3
show x

name: t02_add
src:
üõ† add(a: Int, b: Int) -> Int:
    return a + b
show add(2, 5)

name: t03_if_else_true
t04_if_else_false
t05_while
src:
i: Int = 0
while i < 3:
    show i
    i = i + 1

name: t06_concat_text
src:
a: Text = "hi"
b: Text = "!"
show a + b

name: t07_ask
src:
name: Text = ask("who")
show name

name: t08_call_nested
src:
üõ† mul(a: Int, b: Int) -> Int:
    return a * b
show mul(2, mul(3,4))

name: t09_return_null

üõ† f() -> Int:
    return null

name: t10_unary_minus
src: show -5

name: t11_float_div
src: show 7 / 2

name: t12_verify_ok
src:
üîç true
show 1

name: t13_scope_if
src:
x: Int = 1
if true:
    y: Int = 2
    show x + y
show x

name: t14_scope_while
src:
i: Int = 0
while i < 2:
    t: Int = i
    show t
    i = i + 1

name: t15_compare_eq
src:
show 2 == 2
show 2 != 3

name: t16_compare_rel
src:
show 2 < 3
show 3 >= 3

name: t17_function_params
src:
üõ† id(a: Int) -> Int:
    return a
show id(9)

name: t18_two_funcs
src:
üõ† inc(a: Int) -> Int:
    return a + 1
üõ† add2(a: Int) -> Int:
    return inc(inc(a))
show add2(5)

name: t19_text_escape_n
src: show "a\\n b"

name: t20_show_null_var
src:
x: Null = null
show x

name: t21_assign_update
src:
x: Int = 1
x = x + 4
show x

name: t22_loop_zero
src:
i: Int = 0
while i < 0:
    show 1
show 9

name: t23_return_early
src:
üõ† f(a: Int) -> Int:
    if a == 0:
        return 10
    return 20
show f(0)
show f(1)

t25_call_in_exprstmt

p()
